name: TUBE RUNNER
description:
Tube Runner is a puzzle runner game . Your objective is to move through pipes filled with obstacles without breaking bones in order to unlock new and exciting levels.

  • Game has over 30 unique levels split into sets of 6-9 levels.
  • Player has 3 lives  that can be lost by running into obstacles.
  • Total time spent on each set is recorded and can be checked under MISC menu , compare your times with friends and find out who is the fastest tube runner.
The controls are simple
  • AD to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • R to Retry level
Install Instructions
  1.  Un-zip the file
  2. Open "TubeRunner.exe"
  3. Enjoy!
